mapper.insert: insert INTO list (LIST_ID, ID, PAID, BANK, OPERATIONS, MONEY, NAME, CATEGORY, DAY, LOCATIONX, LOCATIONY) values (seq_list.nextval,#{id},#{paid},#{bank}, #{operations},#{money}, #{name},#{category},sysdate, #{locationX},#{locationY})
mapper.select: select list_id as listId,id,paid,bank,operations,money,name,category,DAY,locationX,locationY from list where id = #{id }
